message:
"House passes bill reauthorization of the nation's most comprehensive law to combat human trafficking."  The bill allocates $520 million over four years toward programs that aim to identify and aid victims of trafficking and prevent it from occurring."
#HelpERASE

data.description: Bill is one of more than a dozen measures the House has passed in recent weeks to fight trafficking and sexual abuse.
data.title: House passes sweeping overhaul of law to combat human trafficking
